Text: Aye, boss!
This ain't lookin' good...
Let's get 'em!
That's how it's done!
I'm bleedin' bad!
We're countin' on ye!
We live to mine another day!
They're too...strong...
I can't take much more of this...
Nobody told me there would be giants...

GRAAAHHH!
BURN, BURN ALL!
A giant golem! Run for your lives!

Much to your chagrin, the experiment shall now begin!
O～hohohohoho!
Begone, foul creature!

My minion has fallen? Consider me floored.
Oh well, back to the drawing board.

I've collected valuable data from all this fighting.
Armed with this knowledge, I shall begin my smiting!
O～hohoho!

Well, what have we here?
You're not half as helpless as you appear.

While I'd like nothing more than to stick around and play,
I fear I've more important matters to attend to today.

After all, I've experiments to conduct, and golems to build.
But we'll meet again...if you can avoid getting yourself killed.

O～hohoho!
O～hohohohohoho!

Oh dear, is it already this time of day?
I really must be on my way.

Next time we find ourselves warring,
do try to be a little less...boring.

Death by stomping, or death by curse?
You decide which one is worse!
O～hohoho!

You can run,
I won't make fun!

<yawn> Could you put up more of a fight?
I'm about to call it a night...

That wasn't wise...
Prepare for a quick demise!
Have at you!
The horror!
<pant> <pant>
Matron, deliver me!
I...f-fear...no...shadows...
I... I thought I was surely dead.
I owe you my life, adventurer.
Thank the Twelve that you arrived when you did.
I can fight no further. Forgive me...
I am blessed by the almighty Ifrit!
Your fall will be swift!
I hear the feeble sputtering of your spirit's flames!
Target acquired! Ready cannons!
Ah, she purrs like a cat!
Hmph, just a bunch of floating cabbages!
Eorzean savages!
Thou shalt pay dearly for thine intrusion!
Thy kind are not welcome here!
The flames shall consume thee!
Hope to prevail, featherless ones cannot!
Garuda's leal servant, you shall become!
Futile, resistance is!
No one interrupts the coming of the Lord of Crags!
Your bones will adorn Titan's earthen domain!
Filthy overdweller!
Pshhh... Finleshhh ones will not leave this place alive!
Begone as foam upon the waves!
Your shhhouls shall be given to the abyshhh!
You called, boss?
I must be home soon.
My sisters will be sick with worry.
The Springs are not far now...
Pray wait a moment...
Aaah!
Aid me, adventurer!
Voco, prince of chocobos, at your service!
Let us be off! Kweeeh!
We have a Chosen One to save!
Not so fast, MistressMaster! Voco's legs tire!
Kweh! Kweh!
Voco is a brave bird, oh yes!
I'll save you, kupo!
Your Grace, we beseech you! Save us in our hour of need, kupo!
Just hold still, kupooo...
This'll put some spring into your step!
Your Grace, your Mogglesguard is nearly undone! Save us, kupo! Save us!
You brought this on yourself, kupo!
You should never have come here, kupo!
An ally of the Brotherhood!?
Interfering gnat!
The Flamefangs rule this land!
You will all be slaves!
Death to those who resist!
Lord Ifrit is almighty!
My spear craves your cries!
Do you bite, little desert fly?
All will bow before us!
My fists are blessed by flame!
Such feeble attacks!
We are the masters of Thanalan!
No ones shall pass!
The podling belongs to these ones!
Enemy of boss one is enemy of these ones.
Meddling ones' bones will litter the forest!
Tee hee! So much fun to kill walking ones!
Boss one! This one sees dead ones!
Look upon this one, and fear!
Chosen One belongs with this one!
Meddling ones will not leave this place alive!
This one is─hic!─feeling gooooood!
Tee hee! Tee hee hee hee hee...hic!
Ooh, a walky one. Got milkroot, walky one?
Uh-oh... You made Biggy angry!
Who dares challenge our might!?
Gimme a cure!
Pshhh! For Lord Leviathan!
Finleshhh wretches!
Pshhh! Cower before the raging sea!
On my mark, Kapa!
Kogi, Piko─ As one!
You got it, kupo!
Puki, Kipp, let 'em have it!
Here it comes, kupo!
There's no escape, kupo!
For the king, kupo!
Piko, Pako─ Delta!
Aye aye!
Fer the fallen, kupo!
You brought this on yourself, kupo!
You're not getting away this time, kupo!
Let's dance, kupo!
For the guard, kupo!
Y-Yes sir!
Y-Yes sir!
Hail to the king, kupo!

Ey? What's the fuss─
the trouble, the matter, the fuss?
Zo Ga wants these tunnels clean, and what Zo Ga says, goes.
Ye'll not leave these tunnels alive.
The enemy of Zo Ga is my enemy.
I'll bore a hole in yer bloody chest.
Begone, ye bouldery buggers!
Beauteous...to the last!
Owww! Go easy, will ya!?
What in the swivin' hells!?
And so it goes...
In-Inconceivable!
Drown in endless darkness!
Go and bugger yourself!
Idiot! Half-wit!
dummy - report if visible
Muahaha! How do you like that!?
Huh!?
Hm!?
Wh-What?
Why, you rotten─ That's CHEATING!
N-No!
Hold...hold that thought...
(That's it...)
(One more...)
(Heh heh...)
Shkoh! Shkoh! Brayflox needs lenthand of uplander!
Stop Illuminati from dirty-taking stinkysweet cheese!
Uplander is to follow Brayflox!
Beware! Beware!
Shkoh! Brayflox is forgetting busydeal! Uplander must go alone!
Yes, yes! Continue on walkpath!
Brayflox gives lenthand to gobbieflock!
More downstrike! More fastness!
Many thanks! Many thanks!
Shkoh! Two more of gobbieflock needing lenthand!
Shkoh! Illuminati strike from upground!
Thank gob!
Shkoh... Illuminati strike with fastness, destroy muchly!
Just for cheese!?
Many thanks! Many thanks!
Shkoh... Illuminati destroy watercross!
Shkoh! No more nice gobbie! Brayflox backpays Illuminati muchly!
Uplander is to follow Brayflox!
This way is sneakway!
Illuminati will not have cheese!
Shkoh! Enemy is eyecatched!
Summon lentfists!
Cheese is gobbie birthright! Knowings of cheesemake bring much jinglyshine!
Shkohhh! Illuminati will not have cheese!
Brayflox watches back of uplander!
Firebooms from gobmachine!
The world...is unready...
Secret ingredient...<mumble>...must not be unclosed...
<mumble> is secret ingredient!? Oh my gob!

Your faith means nothing─
mine, everything!

You have been blind─
but now you shall see!

Blood and thunder?
Blood and fire!
The only truth...is fire!
From flesh...to flame...
Mwahaha! Hagh! Hagh!

Kurhhhr! A slave of
the wroth one!

A worm! A worm to pluck
from an apple!

Rrrgggl! To fear me
is to love me!
It comes! The sacrifice!

An army of slaves
and fanatics!

Here...there...
Foes everywhere!

Wavekin sighted! 
To me, to me!

In fighting is honor,
and in death, glory!
Forward! For Ishgard!

If this is my death,
I like the cut of it!

How many dead? Wounded?
Report!

Blessed be Halone, Her
wrath my mother's milk...

None shall stand against
the knights of Ishgard!

They fall, they fall,
but we─we are forever!

Hold!
I say hold this posi...

Halone...
I see your face...

Mother...?
Is it very late...?
Swivin'...dragon...scum...
Graaarrrgh!
Raise your voices in exaltation!
The blessed hour is nigh!
May their love last for all time!

Move, you laggards!
Move, I said!

Rest when you've earned it,
here or in the heavens!

Get that cannon sponged!
You, ready on the vent!
Ice of darkness, freeze mine enemies!
Blaze of darkness, scorch mine enemies!
Lightning of darkness, smite mine enemies!
Come thee forth, staff of eld!
Curses... My powers are spent...
A gift from Master Amon!
Behold the marvels of Allagan science!
Fireworks become you!
Fancy a spot of mummery?
Is it just me, or is it a mite chilly in here?
Begone, vermin!
This should be interesting...
No holding back now, Scions!
Take him! He's open!
Avere... My sun and stars...
You are as insects to be crushed underfoot!
Intruders! To arms, to arms! Squawk!
Sic 'em, you lot! Sic 'em, you lot! Squawk!
Swivin' hells! Swivin' hells! Squawk!
Get the cap'n! Get the cap'n! Squawk!
Can't...go...on...

Work, slaves, work!
No rest for you!
N-No more...
Eeek! Help!
Into gaol you go!
Aaaaaah!
We'll be a few steps ahead of you!

“Run away, run away!”
Ahahaha, green ones funny!
Magicks of standard give us strength!
Mamool Ja have much power!
This great source of Mamool Ja's might!
Our friends are imprisoned yonder!
Let me out!
Th-Thank you.
Here, this way will be faster!
Kick the Silverscales out of our home!
You will go no further!
SheHe must not harm the Lady!
Trespasser... Defiler!
Rend asunder with fang and claw...
Ye'll sleep with the fishes!
Yer crab fodder!
Fer Lord Leviathan!
Graaarrrgh...
Hurrrgh!
End...the pain...
One of us! One of us!

Don't look at me!
Don't look at meee!
There's no going back...
You defend tonberries!?
What? Why you stop Mamool Ja fun!?
You die now!
Wh-Where you come from!?
Hah! Mamool Ja find you!
Mamool Ja kill you, and dance on bones!
Arrows of frost to keep my enemies at bay!
A blade of ice to defend my brothers!
The cycle ends here and now!
A shower of ice to rend flesh and bone!
Not another step!
Give unto me your strength...
Show your true colors, fiend!
The parade will soon commence. Are you suitably frightening and festive in form?
If not, ask the unusual illusionist yonder for assistance.
Cast the Festal Cant charm upon the citizens, but avoid the thaumaturges who are in the crowd.
The people are waiting. Let us march.
Shower the citizens with the Festal Cant charm.
Follow me.
We are almost there...
Here the parade ends. Well done.
For good measure, let me see you cast the charm one last time.
Heh heh heh... That was fun, was it not?
Over here! This way!
A charm for happiness and fortune? I gotta get me some of that!
Ooh, I love me a good costume parade!
I want that charm all over me! Give it to meee!
I haven't had this much fun in ages!
M-My precious...!
What is all this commotion?
I've got this! Get movin'!
Here's our ale thief!
Sound the alarum!
Get outta me face!
But, how did ye─!?
Oh, thank you! Thank you...
I'm free...?
Gaaarrr!
Aaargh!
Gaaah! The light!
What you cannot see can hurt you!

Ehehehe...
Find me─if you can!
Reveal yourself, my shadow!
Wh-What'd I do to you!?

A fight, is it?
Glad to oblige!
Come one, come all, and join the Spectral Parade.
March along the avenue, we shall, in forms frightening and festive.
A magical time is guaranteed to be had by all.
Speak with the unusual illusionist yonder, and he will weave for you a new form.
Thaumaturges will try to ruin our fun. Be wary of them.
Where are the bloody reinforcements!?
C-Confound it!
Now for them earrings...
Yer mine, scrag!
It's the choppin' block for you!
Yer code don't mean shite to me!
Now, show me what you have learned.
This is the Katon of a true master!
You show promise. A shame you will not live to fulfill it...
Gahaha! This is the lesson I should have taught you long ago!
The weak shall feed the strong...
I am afraid the parade has come to an end.
Thank you for helping to spread the joy. Heh heh heh...
What are you doing here!?
Take a look at this jewel, boys! It's the size of me fist!
That's amazin', boss! We're gonna be rollin' in it!
Alright, we got what we came for. Let's get out of here!
You must kill their leader!
My thanks!
I am in your debt!
No... Not like this...
Argh... I'm done for...
No, really! This is our last battle! Honest!
Fungahhh!!!
Out of bounds!
Mr. Typhon and I are friends forever!
Fuuunfuuun!!!
Imp! Buddy! Pal!
I know what you're thinking... “Man, that was cheap!” Sorry, so sorry!
Mr. Typhon's not so great with words, but his strength'll blow you away!

Thought you had me?
I've got more lives than I do arms!
Imps just love Uncle Ulty!

Too clingy for ya?
Whaddaya expect!? I'm an octopus!

I gots a little surprise for y'all.
It'll be TONS of fun!
Lighten up, will ya?
Is this the end for Uncle Ulty!?
Now kids, I hate to ink and run, but─urk...
Fu...unggghhh...
Oi! You ain't meant to be 'ere!
Yer in for it now, mate!
Funga-gah!?

No, Mr. Typhon!
Say it ain't so!

Alright, Mr. Typhon! Time to make 'em fly!
Hands off Mr. Typhon, kids! Don't touch Mr. Typhon!
Welcome to the training course!
To accelerate, press and hold the Move Forward key.
Note that your chocobo's stamina will decrease more quickly when accelerating.
Be warned─chocobos pushed too hard will become lathered and lose stamina even more quickly!
Next, practice steering your chocobo.
Scattered throughout the course are magicked panels which bestow various effects when triggered.
Your chocobo gained a temporary burst of speed! However, be warned: not all panels bestow beneficial effects!
In addition to magicked panels, you may come across treasure coffers containing race items.
Race items will be added to your hotbar automatically, and can be used to help yourself or hinder your opponents.
Watch carefully and make the routine your own!
If you are uncertain as to how to perform, might I suggest pairing with another HyuranElezenLalafellMiqo'teRoegadynAu RaHrothgarViera?
Allow the motions to flow from your very heart and soul.
Empty your mind of all thoughts and embrace the routine.
This is it, my friend. Your big chance! There is no right or wrong. Only dance or dance not!
The next verse calls us! Is your heart ready to answer?
We are halfway to our goal! There is no turning back now!
We approach the climax. Do not let your limbs fall limp just yet!
Grief and wrath consume you!
Death's embrace awaits!
Let us take a measure of your soul!
How much are you worth, I wonder?
Welcome, ladies and gentlemen! Thank you for joining us for this drawing of the Jumbo Cactpot.
Now, without further ado, let us set the wheels in motion!

And the winning number for draw  is...
!
Whether or not you hit the Cactpot today, just remember: there's always drawing number  to look forward to!
Here you can practice the basics of chocobo racing.
Continue to accelerate and observe the effects. Once your chocobo's stamina is completely depleted, your speed will drop, and you will no longer be able to accelerate.
To alleviate this condition, press the Move Back key to decelerate and allow your chocobo to rest.
Press the Move Left and Move Right keys to steer your chocobo from one side of the course to the other.
To trigger a magicked panel, steer your chocobo towards it.
In addition to steering away from panels, you can also jump to avoid them.
Some treasure coffers will be suspended in midair, so to obtain the race items within, you will need to jump.
This concludes the chocobo racing training course.
You may repeat this course at any time should you wish to review the fundamentals.
Ride well, and good luck!
First, tilt the left stick up, or press  key to accelerate.
To alleviate this condition, tilt the left stick down to decelerate and allow your chocobo to rest.
Tilt the left stick to the left and right to steer your chocobo from one side of the course to the other.
All race chocobos will carry their rider to the end of a course. However, only a skilled jockey can guide his steed to victory.
I...I'm free of the rancor...
Hah! That'll teach you!
'Tis done!
We're free!
The rancor will trouble us no more.
I weary of this plodding pace!
Swift shall be your destruction!
Shrivel in apocalyptic flame!
I shall turn the very ground against you!
Fancy some feathers, bird brain!?
This should cut you down to size!
Not the strongest of swords, but it should suffice.
Gilgamesh is in the mood...for dancing!
Divide and conquer, Gilgamesh style!
...And now for something truly shocking!
What's the matter, friend? All tied up?
Banish your fear!
Stand your ground!
Ishgard must not fall!
Blasted dragons!

Triple Triad is played by placing cards on a three-by-three grid.
The player to act first is decided at random.

Now it's your turn!
Place a card in one of the empty spaces adjacent to my card.

See how my card changed color?
This means you have “captured” the card.

Try to capture and control more cards than your opponent!
The match will end when all spaces on the grid have been filled.

And the match is over! Whoever controls the most cards
at the end of the game is the winner!

The limited-time event “CliffhangerVase OffSkinchange We Can Believe InThe Time of My LifeAny Way the Wind BlowsLeap of FaithAir Force OneThe Slice Is Right” is now underway in Wonder Square Eastin Event Squarein Round Squareat the Cactpot Board. All guests are encouraged to participate!

The special limited-time event has concluded.
We look forward to your participation in events to come!

Entries for the main stage event are now closed.
Those wishing to observe the show are welcome in Event Square!

Tickets for drawing number  of the Jumbo Cactpot are now on sale.
To try your luck, visit the Cactpot Board!

A Triple Triad tournament is about to commence!
Prospective challengers are invited to assemble in Card Square or the Battlehall.

A Triple Triad tournament is currently underway!
Prospective challengers are invited to assemble in Card Square or the Battlehall.

Triple Triad tournament registration will close momentarily.
Prospective challengers, please hasten to Card Square!

Fancy your bird the fleetest in the realm?
The chocobo registrar is ever accepting registrations for new race chocobos!

Entries are now being accepted for drawing number  of the Mini Cactpot!
Venture to Entrance Square to test your luck!

Tickets for drawing number  of the Mini Cactpot are now on sale.
To test your fortunes, make your way to Entrance Square!

Entries for drawing number  of the Mini Cactpot will close momentarily.
Those still wishing to purchase a ticket are encouraged to act quickly!
Look, Master Typhon! What are we going to do about these hangers-on!?
That should put you in your place. Let 'em have it, Master Typhon!

I found the snake!
Now hand over the vase if
ye know what's good fer ye!

...And that concludes another exciting Triple Triad tournament!
The winners will be announced in Card Square.
We await your participation in tourneys to come!
Uh-oh! Someone just woke the dragon...
Now, for my next trick!
Parting is such sweet sorrow, but the finale is upon you!
Perfect! You were born for this!

Never, never again!
This I do solemnly swear...
A dancer's eyes are as important as her feet! Drink in the routine as if it were the last cup of water in an endless desert!
Master Typhon is taking a well-deserved rest. Wait on stage until he's ready for you.

And the Early Bird Bonus grants first prize winnerssecond prize winnersthird prize winnersfourth prize winnersconsolation prize winnerseveryone an extra %!
Make sure you lucky folk claim your winnings promptly!
And...one!
And...two!
And...three!
And...four!
Everyone makes mistakes, but only fools make them twice. To the next verse!
It has been a pleasure, my friend. I look forward to our next performance together!

Keep them eyes open!
Any o' these gits could
'ave the vase!
Ye cannot 'ide forever!

I'll rip that vase from yer
cold hooks if I 'ave to!

Come one, come all!
A special limited-time event has commenced in the halls of the Gold Saucer!

Tickets for the Jumbo Cactpot are currently on sale!
Make for the Cactpot Board to test your luck!

It's the moment you've all been waiting for─entries for the Mini Cactpot have commenced!
Head to Entrance Square to test your luck!

The Mini Cactpot is underway!
Head to Entrance Square to test your luck!

Entries for the Mini Cactpot will close momentarily.
If you haven't purchased a ticket yet, you'll want to act quickly!

I'll go first this time to show you how it's done.
I'll also extend the turn limit so you have plenty of time to think!

The numbers you can see each correspond to one side of the card.
Try choosing a card with a bigger number than mine on the adjacent side!
During your turn, even if you play a card with a smaller number, it will not result in that card being captured.
Impenetrable is my defense!
How my blood doth quicken!
The calm before the slaughter...
Subjugation is thy fate!
Swift shall be thy downfall!
A variety of rules exist that change how the game is played, but let's start you off with an easy one─All Open! This rule allows you to see all of your opponent's cards.
Kill the intruders!
Stand your ground! The Fury is with thee!
They've come for the archbishop!
Sound the alarum! They're here!
Ngaaah!
Die, damn you!
Heathen dogs!
Have at thee!
Halone, guide my sword!
Graaahhh!
Down with you!
Raaargh!
They've gotten this far!?
The sanctum is fallen!?
We must hold them here!
You shall go no further!
No, not yet!
Y-Your Eminence...
Gah! It is far from over!
The power! It fills me!
Witness me!
Bow down before me!
How was that!?
Let us see how you handle this!
Brace yourselves!
Now fall!
But...but how!?
Just as Ser Charibert said...
Withdraw to the Inner Sanctum!
I will not yield to you!
I have the power!
Tremble before my might!
Hmph. I had you...
Well, time is on our side.
We will meet again!
Come forth, my pretties!
How shall you fare against this, I wonder?
Stay alert!
Eyes front!
Raaarrrgh...
Help...me...
Ah...the pain...
My knights! To arms!

O Ascalon! Partake
of the Eye's power!
Shine for me, my blade!
Sing for me, my blade!

Let us settle this
once and for all!
With me, Ser Janlenoux!
Ever and always, Brother!
Bleed!
Taste my steel!
That's enough...

Leave them for
our brothers...

For the glory of
King Thordan!
I will turn you into ash!
Your judgment is nigh!

Surging aether, become
searing light!
Feel the power of the dragoon!
Be frozen to your very souls!
My lance pierces all!
Prepare yourselves!
Gahahaha!
Heavens rain death upon you!
I will crush you!
Yah!
Hah!
Yaaargh!
No...
I...I cannot lose...
I have the power...

A thousand years
of prayer...
Swift shall be thy downfall!
All are fodder for the colony!
The calm before the slaughter...
Subjugation is thy fate!
Unbreakable is my carapace!
My thanks.
 Select a minion from the minion hotbar.
 Use the movement keys to shift your viewpoint around.Use the left stick to shift your viewpoint around.
 Left-click onPress the  button to select the “A” found on the display above the hotbar, and try summoning a minion from Gate A.
 Summon several minions, and view them in the summoning queue.

 Select the hatchling, and move it inside the yellow circle. Left-click to select a minion, and right-click to select the destination.Hold down the  button to select a minion, and press the  button to select the destination.

 Left-click and drag the cursor to select all the hatchlings, then use right-click to move them to the yellow circle.Hold the  button to select all the hatchlings, then press the  button to move them to the yellow circle.
 Select the wayward hatchlings and send them against your foes.
 Move the wayward hatchlings to the center of the field, and defeat the minions that threaten Arcana Stone B.
 Send the wayward hatchlings to defeat the behemoths.

 Select an individual hatchling, then click the Execute Action button on the minion hotbar.Use ＋ to select an individual hatchling, then press the  button ＋ the  button to execute the special action.
 Select all the wayward hatchlings, and return them to a gate to restore their HP.
 Select all the wayward hatchlings, then send them to another gate.
 Select the hatchling action party, and move them to the enemy's Arcana Stone B in the center of the field.
 Attack the enemy's Arcana Stone B.
 Attack Arcana Stone B with the mammets and watch how quickly the Arcana Stone's HP is depleted.
 Destroy your opponent's Shield using the cherry bombs.
 Shatter Arcana Stone B completely.
 There are no Arcana Stones to shatter during a boss battle. Defeat the boss to claim victory.
 Move a minion near the device to obtain the “Trapper” status.
 Use the Execute Action button to set a trap.
 Use the Trigger Trap button to attack the slime.
All attacks against a stunned boss will become critical hits.
Mine obsidian blade shalt split atwain the threads of thy future...
...whilst its crimson fuller shalt channel the lifeblood of thy past!
Goodness gracious! I, uh, just remembered something!
Hold...hold that thought...
Urgh! I won't go down so easily!
You're not getting past!
Get them!
We're being followed! Seize them!
You! Bring us some meat for the journey home!
Yes, sir!
I was wondering when you'd show your faces!
Not here...
I should not have had that second ale.
Please... Do not let me die here...
Sir! Beasts approach the company!
I'll see you...in the seventh hell!
I heard something, sir!
I must...inform...the capt─
We cannot wait for stragglers! File in!
Ugh...
I'm finished...
Unyielding earth...
Nourishing water...

Essence of life,
smite mine enemy!
We've been followed!
Kill herhim!
I-I know how to use this!
S-Stay away from me!
H-Help! Somebody, help!
You fool! You led them right to us!
They've found us! To arms!
That was thoroughly unpleasant...
Keep your filthy hands off me!
Dark ones everywhere!
Mercy! Mercy!
Behold the might of dragon blood!

O crimson elixir of life...
Bequeath unto me thy power!
I've failed...
The Fury take me...
I'm done for...
So much blood...
And so I fall...
The flames are too strong!
S-Ser Charibert, what are you doing!?
My lord, you must restrain yourself!
M-My lord, please!
Load! Aim! Fire!
What is this that courses through my veins?
I shall fend off their steel!
I've never felt so full of vim!
Leave these for me!
Begone from my forest!
We're done for!
Stop saying that!
There is no escape!
Their lives belong to Lord Ifrit!
Keep running!
Stinky man-thief!

Not your loots!
Yoyoroon's loots!
We loot loots fair and square!
No loots for you!
Heals for you!
Hurts are hurtful...
Be strong for loots!
All loots belong to great Yoyoroon!
You must slay these minions!
Uh-oh, kupo...
A woman in black? What's wrong with the woman standin' afore ye?
I might've seen me a lass scurryin' off to the Hyaline.
Will someone not save me?
! We must save Lady Leveva!
Which one is Lady Leveva!?
I's Lady Lavevvi!
You have to even ask, Quimperain!?
Netherlings! Attack!
Away with you!

Good lu～ck!
(You're going to need it!)
Whew...
S-Stop it!
I'm too beautiful to die!

My wings are tired
and my pom heavy, kupo...

They're coming, kupo!
They're coming!!!
My landlord hero, kupo!

But I don't want
to be supperbreakfastlunchsupper, kupo!

Somemoogle, anymoogle!
Heeeeeelp!!!

You don't want to eat
me, kupo! I'm all gristle!

I can hear their bellies
grumbling from here, kupo!

It's time we taught
you a lesson, Mogoosh!

Oh yeah?
You and what army, kupo!?

Uh...the one hiding
behind those bushes, kupo!
What bushes!?

Uh...the ones hidden
behind those rocks, kupo!

Well, come out then
and teach away, kupo!

You mustn't always
think of yourself, kupo!

You are a moogle of Mog-
home! Act like one, kupo!

A few nuts up the nose of a
skylord never hurt anyone!

Moogles should be free
to do as we please, kupo!

I hope you've learned
your lesson, kupo!

Try anything again, and
next time it's your pom, kupo!
Yes, sir...

How's a mog supposed to
have any fun around here...
Gah...

One of these days you'll
get your just deserts, kupo!
Desserts?
When do we eat, kupo!?
Not bad for a beginner...
Yer serious about this, ain't ye?
Load! Aim! Fire!
Right between the eyes!
Your art is feeble...
This ends here!

Where, oh where has
my little mog gone?♪
Listen! Did you hear that?
The kupos...

Could they be coming
from that thing's belly?

There's nothing in here but
a bunch of bones and fur!
Where could my friend be?

That's odd... The kupos
have stopped...kupo.

Must find new boomydoom
for uplander headbreaking!
Out of the way, kupo!

<sigh>
Not this one again...

What do you mean,
“Not this one again”?

I thought I was
being quite clear.

Are you being
smart with me, kupo?
That is what it appears.

Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Bluehands are backtied!

Now move, before I
really get angry, kupo!
I guess I'll go around, kupo...

<sigh>
Until next time.

Bested by a moogle... My
father will not be pleased.

Feel free to yield
at any time, kupo!
Had enough yet, kupo?

Must we do this
every day, moogle?

Don't you have some
kupo nuts to gather?
Ungh...
Not bad!
Graaarrrgh!
Pshkohhh! Chaaarge!

The sealords!
They come, kupo!

You must help us
protect Moghome, kupo!

Where did they come from?
There is no sea in the
clouds, but the Sea of Clouds!

I'm so frightened,
I cannot look, kupo!

Moghome will reek of
fish and kelp, kupo!
You've saved us, kupo!
I must warn the others, kupo!

Twinkle, twinkle, little coin
I need more,
so come and join...
......me♪

The others will be white
with envy when they see
my new necklace, kupo!

The twinkling is
all around us, kupo!

Yes, yes...
Drink of the abyss...

But a sliver...
Not too much...
Fall back!

I'm not going
to make it, ribbit...

A thousand thanks, ribbit!
A thousand and one!

Maro feels hungry eyes
fixed on her plump legs...

I don't see why Mistress
Matoya cannot simply
send her brooms.

You don't really think the
mistress would throw me
in the cauldron...do you!?

Shkohhh... Slicktrix must
be telling shirefriends!

Commence backwalking
or boom goes the uplander!

Backwalk now or
downwalk into deathpit!
Ride ye the wind...
And become as light!
They shall answer for this!
Lay down your weapons and the old man lives!

No whizzlepops here!
Backturn your uplander front!

Why is uplander sneak-
rifling gobbiehome?

Pssshhh...
The battle is unwon...

Pssshhh... Shkoh!
Far too overclose!

Illuminati booms
bring blastydoom!

Might vangobs be requiring
more board-drawing?

Vangobs generating much
bounciness. Not good for
bad gobbieback!

Hah hah hah! Illuminati
joyshouts echo through land!

Doom! Zoom!
Vangob boom!

Ironfists bring
bangyknocks!

None can backfight
mighty Illuminati!

Whizzlepops crushed
and crumbled!

Gobbiehead is dealt
much overhurt... Backfall!

Operation backsnatch,
fizzwhizzled!

Illuminati approach
on swiftheels aplenty!

Ring the loudbells!
Hide the whizzlepops!

Never before have I seen
the wolves in such a frenzy!

It is time we made our last
stand. Are you with us?

Gut them like
the curs they are!
Why do they still follow!?
Over here!
They've finally turned tail!
Back to your dens!

House Durendaire
does not retreat!

This one would
make a fine gambison!
That was quite the display!

House Durendaire could
use more knights like you.
Come! My blade still thirsts!
I'll skin you all alive!
Until we meet again, friend!

We must make it
to the garrison!

I don't think I can
run any further...
I'll try and draw them away!
Fall back!
And boom go the whizzlepops!

If Illuminati cannot
have whizzlepops, no gob will!

Forget backsnatch!
Boom and doom!

Illuminati backstrikes!
Defend the whizzlepops!

No backsnatch this time!
Only blastydoom!

Whizzlepops cannot
withstand blastydoom!
Resuming keepy-look.

Pshmph! Illuminati
are unlearning!

Goodgobbies,
to arms!

All your whizzlepops
are belong to us!

Backstrike at
bluehands!

Psheehee!
A winner is us!
Woe is gobbie...

Pshkohhh!
Revenge!

You are no match
for Illuminati!

All who backfight
will die muchly!

Ironfist of Moundrinx
turns you into bittybits!

Tasty-fresh victory
will be mine!

P-Plan is going
unrightly...

We backwalk
in triumph!

Who's there!?
Show yourselves!
Hells above! Deepeyes!
Blind them all!

There's nothing
to see here!
Don't blink!

Never show them
your backs!
Reinforcements!

It has been an honor to
fight alongside one so brave.

We were fools to even
come to this place!
Show them...no...mercy...

Ten summers I've served
and not a blemish...
Let us see to it, then.
I truly have no luck, do I...?

If this doesn't make
the crone happy, at least
the wolves will eat well...

That is it! I've had enough.
Toss me in the dungeons,
and throw away the key.
I'm not killing another buck.

I'm sorry, poor buck.
It's nothing personal.
Welcome to Ishgard.
Just following orders.

Did you see that? Over
there? And there? And...!?

Perhaps we should
hop faster, ribbit!

My skin has grown all
clammy from fear!
Wait... It's always clammy...

Birds! Not the birds!
Anything but birds! <croak>

I will best any man
or woman in the realm!

Who dares interrupt
my impending victory!?

Laugh at that, my
brothers! Laugh at that!

See my brothers! This one
is no match for Alaimbert!
I have yet to break a sweat!

I may not even
need my butt!

You have tasted my spear,
but are you ready for my butt!?

Matoya's Cave
is just yonder.

Thank you, kind adventurer!
You saved my legs!

Once you've all witnessed
the wrath of the spiked butt...

I shall be the
only one laughing!

I am a Knight Dragoon!
You are but an adventurer!

This pitiful display will
prove naught to my
brothers. Come harder!
You pull your punches!
Thrust! Jab! Impale!

I will not stop until my
spear is notched and
my butt is blunt!
Who is laughing now!?

Pssshhh...
This bodes unwell...

Are there no
gobbiefriends about?

Browfix will never fill
braincase now...

What lost-thoughts hide
'twixt wordleaves?
Browfix shall unfind!

Hail!
The Spiked Butt returns!

A thrill it was to
fight butt by side!
I am spent...

I cannot let my brothers
see me fail. You understand.

I sense greatness
within you, adventurer.

You have yet to show
me all you have under
that armor.
Dare I ready my butt!?

With butt in hand and you
at my side, there are none
who might stand in our way!

Let us put an
end to this, quickly!
<croak>!?
Go eat a chocobo!
Away! Away! Shoo!
Beasts approach the bridge!

The span must
remain clear!

The creatures flee!
The day is ours!

The bridge is overrun!
Withdraw and regroup!
Toss them over the edge!
Stand your ground!
For the Nest!

What the Fury's
name is that!?

Mark my words! They
won't be coming back again!

The lord commander
will be sorely displeased...
Form a wedge!
Darkscale. You have no place here.
Silence, traitor! It is you who are guilty of trespass!
Your crimes against kith and kin are unforgivable. You shall be made to pay.
Not this day, old one!

Never have I seen a sloth
move with such swiftness!

Did you see the fear in
that dragon's ugly face as
my arrow pierced its neck?
You mean that dragonling?

What!? Do I detect a hint
of jealousy in your voice?

Jealous that you stabbed
an injured dragonling in the
back while it was passed out?

That glory is all
yours, my brother.

How dare you try and
lessen the glory I have
brought to all Convictors!

Whereas you have brought
us nothing but shame!

The Convictors will
suffer you no longer!

You would dare attack
a brother unprovoked!?

Swear you will no longer
sully our order's name!
Alright! You have my word!
How could I...

The captain will
hear of this affront!
Kneel, dirty scoundrel!

Not as easy a mark as
a dying dragon pup, am I?

Using an outsider to fight
your own battles? Tell me,
where is the glory in that!?

The killing blow was mine!
Even you cannot deny that!
Hah!
You're too slow, Beaudonet!

Too long did we wait...
Too strong have you become...

I cannot fall!
I am immortal...!
Curse you, champion of Hydaelyn...
The morning star riseth in the east, granting me strength!
The malefic descendeth in the west, granting me knowledge!
The benefic shineth in the south, granting me life!
The pole star shineth in the north, granting me dominion!
I...I am spent...
Remember to ware the butt!
Have at it, then!

I leave him in
your capable hands.
Impressive for one all but forgotten.
Yet you turn to the sons of man for aid.
Have you no pride?
Pride is the sin which blackens your heart, Darkscale.
You fight with fire!
I fight with a purpose.
To make peace with the sons of man?
Those who will only betray you again?
This is not the end, Vedrfolnir.

Now what will I wear
to the big pomfire, kupo?

Something big and
hungry this way comes!
Ku...po... Kup...o...
Ku...po?
Po...po...popo...kupo...
Why won't he just listen...?

I beg of you, kind land-
lord! He must be stopped!

Mogoosh will be
the end of us all!

He cannot be allowed
to carry on like this, kupo!

My father will
hear of this affront.
Hear me, my children! I return to Tharl Oom Khash!
See that the traitor cannot follow!
You will not escape so easily, Darkscale!
As you command, my lord.
We shall paint Zenith red with their lifeblood.
A traitor has no place above Sohm Al!
We shall cast your bones from her summit!
Nidhogg has poisoned the minds of so many...
How soon you forget the betrayal. It has been but a thousand short years!
I have not forgotten, but I have forgiven!
The traitor does not falter.
We must needs end this quickly. Come, my brothers!
Forgive me...my lord...
I shall await you...in Sohm Al...

It appears weakness is
my greatest weakness...

And to think, the
day began so well...

A fine day to
rest and reflect.

Another boring day in the
Mists, kupo. There has to
be something fun to do...

Kupo, kupo,
and off we go!
We made it, kupo!

Look! A flower, kupo!
Isn't it beautiful!?

Might we rest a spell?
My wings are exhausted!
This is a nice spot, kupo.
Almost there, kupo!
Kupopopo!

Maybe my friends were
right to stay home, kupo...

I'm not afraid, kupo...
Honest!

Don't eat me! Don't eat
me! Don't eat me, kupo!

Children of the land,
answer my plea!
Mine uncle is this way.

It appears he
still has strength.

However, it fades fast.
Prithee lend him aid!

Uncle... Wait for me
in Sohm Al...
<roar>

I am a rock!
I will not budge!
Who wants to die next!?
Uncle! You are safe!

So, it was you who
summoned help.
